channel.title: Stockwatch - Key Events
channel.description: Real-time corporate announcements, deals, and financial results.

item.title: [KEL] Kotia Enterprises Ltd. Board Approves Appointment of Mr. Anil Gupta as Whole-time Director
item.description:
Kotia Enterprises Ltd. announced that the Board of Directors approved the appointment of Mr. Anil Gupta as Whole-time Director at their meeting on 15th January 2026. His appointment is subject to the approval of the Members at the upcoming Extra-Ordinary General Meeting (EGM). The Board also approved the draft Notice of the EGM, including the Explanatory Statement, and decided the day, date, time, and venue of the EGM. Remote e-voting facility will be provided to the Members in accordance with the Companies Act, 2013. The Book Closure dates are fixed from 3rd to 9th February 2026 (both days inclusive) for the purpose of the EGM. Mr. Akash Goel, Proprietor of Akash & Co., Practicing Company Secretaries, is appointed as the Scrutinizer for conducting the remote e-voting process and voting at the EGM.

  • Board approved the appointment of Mr. Anil Gupta as Whole-time Director
  • Appointment is subject to Members' approval at the EGM
  • Draft Notice of the EGM approved, including the Explanatory Statement
  • Remote e-voting facility to be provided to Members
  • Mr. Akash Goel appointed as the Scrutinizer for the e-voting process

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Kotia Enterprises Ltd | Category: Board Meeting

item.title: [BHEL] BHEL Commences Supply of Semi-High Speed Underslung Traction Transformers for Vande Bharat Sleeper Train Project
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

Bharat Heavy Electricals Limited (BHEL) has started the supply of semi-high speed underslung traction transformers for the Vande Bharat Sleeper Train project. This development marks a significant milestone in BHEL's 'Make in India' initiatives for the rail transportation sector. The transformers are being despatched to Kolkata for final assembly of the Vande Bharat Sleeper Trains. BHEL-Jhansi has also received an order for Rail Borne Maintenance Vehicles (RBMV), contributing to indigenisation and self-reliance in railway track maintenance technologies.

  • BHEL commences supply of semi-high speed underslung traction transformers for Vande Bharat Sleeper Train project
  • Transformers to be despatched to Kolkata for final assembly
  • BHEL-Jhansi receives order for Rail Borne Maintenance Vehicles (RBMV)
  • RBMVs to be manufactured domestically, contributing to indigenisation and self-reliance
  • BHEL leading India's journey towards self-reliance in transportation and rolling stock sectors

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: BHARAT HEAVY ELECTRICALS LTD. | Category: New Launch

item.title: [GSFC] Gujarat State Fertilizers & Chemicals Ltd to Approve Q3 and Nine Months Results on Feb 9, 2026
item.description:
Gujarat State Fertilizers & Chemicals Ltd has informed the BSE that their Board of Directors will meet on February 9, 2026, to consider and approve the unaudited financial results for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2025. The trading window for dealing in securities of the company has been closed from December 31, 2025, and will remain closed till 48 hours after the announcement of financial results, i.e., up to February 11, 2026.

  • Gujarat State Fertilizers & Chemicals Ltd to consider and approve Q3 and nine months results on Feb 9, 2026
  • Trading window for dealing in securities closed from Dec 31, 2025, to Feb 11, 2026

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: GUJARAT STATE FERTILIZERS & CHEMICALS LTD. | Category: Quarterly Result

item.title: [CPPLUS] Aditya Infotech Ltd Collaborates with Vijay Sethupathi as Brand Ambassador
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

Aditya Infotech Ltd has announced its collaboration with acclaimed actor Vijay Sethupathi as its Brand Ambassador. This move aims to strengthen the company's consumer presence in Tamil Nadu by making advanced security solutions more approachable, relevant, and culturally resonant for households and businesses. The collaboration will feature integrated brand campaigns across various platforms, specifically tailored to the preferences and needs of the Tamil Nadu consumer landscape.

  • Aditya Infotech Ltd collaborates with Vijay Sethupathi as its Brand Ambassador
  • Collaboration aims to strengthen consumer presence in Tamil Nadu
  • Advanced security solutions to be made more approachable and relevant
  • Integrated brand campaigns across television, digital platforms, outdoor media, retail touchpoints etc.
  • Campaigns tailored specifically to the preferences and needs of the Tamil Nadu consumer landscape

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Aditya Infotech Ltd | Category: New Launch

item.title: [TCI] Transport Corporation of India Ltd: No Re-lodgement Requests for Physical Shares as of January 6, 2026
item.description:
In accordance with SEBI Circular No. SEBI/HO/MIRSD/MIRSD-PoD/P/CIR/2025/97 dated July 2, 2025, the Registrar to an Issue and Share Transfer Agent of Transport Corporation of India Ltd, M/s. KFin Technologies Limited, reported no re-lodgement requests for physical shares as of January 6, 2026. This report confirms the status of requests received from shareholders for the re-lodgment of transfer requests for physical shares under the special window provided by the SEBI Circular dated July 2, 2025.

  • Transport Corporation of India Ltd reported no re-lodgement requests for physical shares as of January 6, 2026.
  • The report was provided by the Registrar to an Issue and Share Transfer Agent of the company, M/s. KFin Technologies Limited.
  • The report confirms the status of requests received from shareholders for the re-lodgment of transfer requests for physical shares under the special window provided by the SEBI Circular dated July 2, 2025.
  • No requests were received, processed, approved, or rejected for processing during the months leading up to January 6, 2026.
  • The average time taken for processing of requests is not applicable (NA) as no requests were received.

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: TRANSPORT CORPORATION OF INDIA LTD. | Category: Monthly Update

item.title: [RETAGGIO] Retaggio Industries Ltd. Approves Allotment of 28,80,000 Convertible Equity Warrants
item.description:
Retaggio Industries Ltd. has approved the allotment of 28,80,000 Convertible Equity Warrants at an issue price of Rs. 26/- per warrant. The Company has received 25% of the issue price, i.e. Rs. 6.50/- per warrant, amounting to Rs. 1,87,20,000/-. The Warrants are convertible into Equity Shares, aggregating to Rs. 7,48,80,000/-. The allotment is made on a preferential basis and is subject to the requirements of all applicable laws and the provisions of the Memorandum and Articles of Association of the Company.

  • Retaggio Industries Ltd. approves allotment of 28,80,000 Convertible Equity Warrants
  • The issue price of the warrants is Rs. 26/- per warrant
  • The Company has received Rs. 1,87,20,000/- towards subscription of the warrants
  • The Warrants are convertible into Equity Shares, aggregating to Rs. 7,48,80,000/-
  • The allotment is made on a preferential basis

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Retaggio Industries Ltd | Category: Investment

item.title: [RATEGAIN] RateGain Powers Sunlight Airâ€™s Growth Journey with Smarter Pricing Decisions
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

RateGain Travel Technologies Limited, a global provider of AI-powered SaaS solutions for travel and hospitality, has announced that Sunlight Air, a boutique leisure airline based in the Philippines, has selected AirGain. Sunlight Air will leverage real-time rate intelligence using AirGainâ€™s unified platform to gain deeper market visibility, strengthen its competitive edge across Southeast Asia, and balance affordability with premium leisure experiences.

  • Sunlight Air has selected AirGain, RateGainâ€™s AI-powered platform, to gain deeper market visibility and strengthen its competitive edge across Southeast Asia.
  • AirGain provides real-time rate intelligence and rate parity insights, helping Sunlight Air to track fares across OTAs and airline sites in real time.
  • This capability enables Sunlight Air to anticipate demand shifts, protect yields, and craft strategies that resonate with digitally savvy travelers.
  • AirGain is introducing its AI-powered Route Performance Digest to select airline partners, including Sunlight Air, to help them respond quickly to market shifts while protecting both value and profitability.
  • Sunlight Air is a boutique leisure airline based in Manila, Philippines, dedicated to providing safe, reliable, and comfortable air travel experiences.

item.title: [MARUTI] Maruti Suzuki India Ltd Schedules Board Meeting to Approve Q4 FY2025-26 Financial Results
item.description:
Maruti Suzuki India Ltd has informed the BSE that a meeting of the Board of Directors is scheduled on 28/01/2026 to consider and approve the unaudited financial results for the quarter ended on 31 December 2025. This is in accordance with Regulation 29 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015.

  • Maruti Suzuki India Ltd has scheduled a Board Meeting on 28th January 2026
  • The meeting aims to consider and approve the unaudited financial results for the quarter ended on 31st December 2025
  • The announcement is in accordance with Regulation 29 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: MARUTI SUZUKI INDIA LTD. | Category: Quarterly Result

item.title: [RETAGGIO] Retaggio Industries Ltd. Approves Allotment of 28,80,000 Convertible Equity Warrants
item.description:
Retaggio Industries Ltd. has approved the allotment of 28,80,000 Convertible Equity Warrants at an issue price of Rs. 26/- per warrant. The Company has received 25% of the issue price, i.e. Rs. 6.50/- per warrant, amounting to Rs. 1,87,20,000/-. The Warrants are convertible into Equity Shares, aggregating to Rs. 7,48,80,000/-. The allotment is made on a preferential basis and is subject to the requirements of all applicable laws and the provisions of the Memorandum and Articles of Association of the Company.

  • Retaggio Industries Ltd. approved the allotment of 28,80,000 Convertible Equity Warrants.
  • The issue price of each warrant is Rs. 26/- including a premium of Rs. 16/- per warrant.
  • The Company has received Rs. 1,87,20,000/- towards the subscription of the warrants.
  • Each warrant is convertible into one equity share of Rs. 10 each at a premium of Rs. 16 per equity share.
  • The conversion can be exercised at any time within a period of 18 months from the date of allotment.

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Retaggio Industries Ltd | Category: Investment

item.title: [BRGIL] B.R.Goyal Infrastructure Ltd Secures Rs. 60 Crore User Fee Collection Contract from NHAI
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

B.R.Goyal Infrastructure Limited (the Company) has announced that it has received a work order for the engagement of user fee collection agency on the basis of competitive bidding through e-tender for Salemgarh fee plaza at Km 313.372 of Gorakhpur - Kasia - UP/Bihar Border Section of NH-28 from Km 279.800 to Km 360.915 (New CH: Km. 285.002 to 366.117) in the State of Uttar Pradesh. The accepted value of the said work order is Rs. 60,42,77,575/- (Rupees Sixty Crore Forty-Two Lakh Seventy-Seven Thousand Five Hundred and Seventy-Five Only). This includes upkeep/maintenance of adjacent toilet blocks including recouping the consumable items.

  • B.R.Goyal Infrastructure Ltd has been awarded a work order by NHAI for user fee collection.
  • The contract is worth Rs. 60,42,77,575/-.
  • The contract is for the Gorakhpur - Kasia - UP/Bihar Border Section of NH-28.
  • The contract includes upkeep/maintenance of adjacent toilet blocks.
  • The contract is for a period of one year.

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: B.R.Goyal Infrastructure Ltd | Category: Deals
